title: Hunt the Devil
tags: how to unlock hunt the devil
content:
X:98 Y:523). After obtaining the item, proceed towards the North West until you reach a fresh waypoint. From there, turn left to encounter a small village with lifeless bodies. Inside a house, you'll meet a person named Anders. Have a conversation with him and select the subsequent choices:

Who - or what - attacked you? What is this place? Rest easy. I'll only stay a short time.

After choosing the first option, Anders will tell you about the attack, and more dialogue options will appear:

Wher
